        public boolean insert(Tuple tuple)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,

        public void deleteFromPage(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> htblColNameValue,
                           java.lang.String strOperator)
                    throws FauxBots.DBEngineException,
                           java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Deletes all tuples that satisfy a condition which is specified by a Hashtable containing Column Name/Value Pairs and an operator that specifies the operation to be done on the pairs
        Parameters:
        htblColNameValue - the Hashtable containing Column Name/Value Pairs
        strOperator - the Operator (Can be either OR or AND)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        returns an iterator to the page if the page contains a Tuple that satisfies the condition specified by the Operator and the Hashtable containing Column Name/Value Pairs
        Returns:
        the iterator to the page is a tuple is found, otherwise null
